text: Plattling is a town in the district of Deggendorf, Bavaria, Germany, on the river Isar, 9 km southwest of Deggendorf, just before it enters the Danube. ==Twin towns â€“ sister cities== Plattling is twinned with: * Scharnitz, Austria * Selkirk, Scotland, United Kingdom ==Notable people== *Nicki (born 1966), singer ==References== Category:Deggendorf (district)
title: Plattling
